text: Brigitte Geoffroy (born 10 March 1964) is a French taekwondo martial artist. She won the silver medal in 1986, and bronze medal in 1990 and 1992 European Taekwondo Championships, in the -65 kg category. She competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics, where taekwondo was a demonstration sport, in the welterweight event. == References == Category:1964 births Category:Taekwondo practitioners Category:French martial artists Category:Living people
title: Brigitte Geoffroy
